reviewText: This was very healing. Reminds me of the Dalai Lama healing chant.

I guess I was expecting something with more ambient sounds - waterfalls, bird calls, electronic textures, anything that would "spin" the mind into a meditative state via the 5.1 surround vehicle.

This DVD consists of sections that begin with, mostly, the ringing of a bell followed by intoning by men's voices and minimal background sounds of unknown origin.

In my opinion, it is not worth the selling price.  Just way too simplistic to warrant the money.
